Articles.Content: Hello i rlly need help, i want to install some mods on my kerbal space program but i dont know how to open my kerbal space program files folder, i saw lots of video on how to but they were all on steam, and i got kerbal on epic games, pls guys rlly help
When you installed KSP, did you put a folder somewhere? If yes, then it's probably this folder.
Have you tried using the file search system and looking for “KSP”?
If you want to find it through file explorer (assuming Windows and default Epic Games download), start looing in your local disk > program files > epic games > Kerbal Space Program.
